Text.text: 1. Click the Environment tab and click the + button
3. Add a new variable called URL and set the initial value to 'https://myhr-dev.health.qld.gov.au'
4. Add a second variable 'SAP-Client and add the value 120
6. In the Create Claim request we have saved in our collection, replace the hostname of the system with {{URL}} and the client number with {{SAP-Client}}

MessageStrip.text: Notice that the auto complete will help you with the variables and also show you the content of collection, global and environment variables when you hover over it.

Text.text: 7. Now create another environment in the same fashion for HEG
8. Click the environment tab and click the ... next to HED and then duplicate
9. Remember to change both the initial value and the current value of the URL
